{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Sha no Sho]]'', page 227 |image=Cherry Blossom Shockwave.png |kanji=桜花衝 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Ōkashō |literal english=Cherry Blossom Impact |english tv=Cherry Blossom Clash |viz manga=Sakura Strike |game names={{translation|[[Catchphrases and Verbal Tics#Shannarō|Chaaa!]]|しゃーんなろー!|Shannarō!}}
{{translation|Mid-Spring Strike|春中打|Shunchūda|eng=Killer Spring}}''Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5'' |parent jutsu=Chakra Enhanced Strength |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Taijutsu |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Sakura Haruno, Sarada Uchiha, Tsunade~game, |debut manga=246 |boruto=No |debut anime=3 |debut shippuden=Yes |boruto anime=No |novel debut=Sakura Hiden: Thoughts of Love, Riding Upon a Spring Breeze |game debut=Naruto Shippūden: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! EX |movie debut=Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Will of Fire |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Novel, Game, Movie }} Although it may appear to be a simple case of superhuman strength, this is actually an application of the precise [[chakra control]] that is used in [[medical ninjutsu]]. The user gathers a dense concentration of chakra in their fist that they release on contact with a target. The resulting damage is enough to seriously damage living targets and will likely also do some collateral damage to the surroundings. Ground that is affected by this jutsu fractures and sends small, flower petal-size particles into the air, hence the name. ==Trivia== * [[Tsunade]] does something similar using the tip of one of her fingers, creating a deep fissure in the earth when she strikes it.''Naruto'' chapter 159, pages 4-5 * In the ''Ultimate Ninja Storm'' series, Sakura uses an advanced version of this technique called {{translation|"Full Bloom: Cherry Blossom Impact"|満開・桜花衝|Mankai: Ōkashō}}. * In ''Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker'', [[Sarada Uchiha]] uses a slightly weaker variant called {{translation|"Crimson Drizzle"|紅時雨|Benishigure}}. * In the crossover comic series ''[[Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x Naruto]]'', Sakura performs a [[cooperation ninjutsu]] with [[w:c:turtlepedia:Raphael (TMNT x Naruto)|Raphael]] called '''Cherry Blossom Shell Smash''', where she throws the mutant turtle at the opponents.''Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x Naruto'' Issue 3, pages 15 and 16 == See Also == * [[Heavenly Foot of Pain]] == References == [[es:Impacto de la Flor de Cerezo]] [[fr:Impact de la Fleur de Cerisier]] [[it:Pugno Concentrato di Chakra]] [[pl:Ōkashō]] [[pt-br:Impacto da Flor de Cerejeira]]
